ygData.subject: Re: 55 Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: While I do not presume to speak for Shada, I think he meant a string instrument only increases the health regen component of the song. Cantana does regen
ygData.messageBody:
While I do not presume to speak for Shada, I think he meant a string
instrument only increases the health regen component of the song.

Cantana does regen health, mana, and STA.

Be well,

Gaelthorne (who still has not run numbers on the Lute of the Howler)
Xegony


--- In eqbards@y..., "Jamie R. Bedford" <bbedford@o...> wrote:
> I was under the impression that it regens mana, health, and
stamina. Stacks with CCC and clarity/clarity2.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> To: 'eqbards@y...'
> Sent: Thursday, May 03, 2001 4:39 PM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] 55 Songs
>
>
> Only the health.
>
> Shada Iceheart [Retired]
> <Afterlife>
>
> > I am about to ding 55, I am curious about the Cantana of
> > Replenishment. What does a stringed intstument do for it?
> > Increase the health, mana or both? Does anyone have any
> > quantative numbers?
